title: Tomato, Garlic and Basil Pasta
ingredients: ['250g pasta of choice', '1 onion, chopped (red if preferred)', '1/2 courgette, sliced and halved', '1 pepper, chopped (red, green or orange)', '6 to 8 black olives', '6 to 8 green olives', '1 tin tomatoes (whole or chopped)', 'drizzle balsamic vinegar', 'drizzle Nandos Hot Peri Peri Sauce (or alternative chilli sauce)', '1 pinch black pepper', '1 pinch coriander', '1 pinch paprika', '1 pinch ginger', '1 pinch parsley', '30 to 40g garlic puree', 'generous helping fresh basil leaves']
